GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles, default sorted by descending, created_at. Can be paginated with limit and p(age), in which case the response will be an object with the an array of that page of articles and and total_count property.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object with the requested article

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of comments for the requested article_id. Can be paginated with limit and p(age), in which case the response will be an object with the an array of that page of articles and and total_count property.

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users:username.description: serves a object of the requested user

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment on the given article_id and serves the new comment object

POST /api/articles.description: adds a new article and serves the new article object. If not provided then the article_img_url will default to https://images.pexels.com/photos/97050/pexels-photo-97050.jpeg?w=700&h=700

POST /api/topics.description: adds a new topic article and serves the new topic object

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Increments the votes on the given article_id by the given amount, and serves with the updated article. Accepts +/-

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Increments the votes on the given comment_id by the given amount, and serves with the updated article. Accepts +/-

exampleResponse.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the given comment_id, server no response

DELETE /api/article/:article_id.description: Deletes the given article_id, server no response
